pages.text: $(li)The Doormat is a a new kind of carpet where $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/cat)Cats$(/l) really love to sit.$(br)$(li)They work as $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/signs)Signs$(/l) too, just right click on them and write something.
$(li)You can right click in the corner of the Doormat while you have a single item in your hand to save it inside.$(br)$(li)Then you can shift right click on a Doormat to save an item under of it.
